dialogStrings: AVALANCHE Hideout

{Barret}
“Yo, {Cloud}!
There's somethin' I wanna ask ya.”{PAUSE}“Was there anyone from SOLDIER
fighting us today?”

{Cloud}
“None.
I'm positive.”

{Barret}
“You sound pretty sure.”

{Cloud}
“If there was anyone from SOLDIER
you wouldn't be standing here now.”

{Barret}
“Don't go thinkin' you so bad jus' cuz
you was in SOLDIER.”

{Cloud}
“…”

{Barret}
“Yeah, you're strong.”{PAUSE}“Probably all them guys in SOLDIER are.”{PAUSE}“But don't forget that
your skinny ass's workin'
for AVALANCHE now!”{PAUSE}“Don't get no ideas
'bout hangin' on to Shinra.”

{Cloud}
“Stayin' with Shinra?”{PAUSE}“You asked me a question
and I answered it…that's all.”

{Cloud}
“I'm going upstairs.
I want to talk about my money.”

{Tifa}
“Wait, {Cloud}!”

{Barret}
“{Tifa}!
Let him go!”{PAUSE}“Looks like he still misses the Shinra!”

nor SOLDIER!”

“But don't get me wrong!”{PAUSE}“I don't care about AVALANCHE or

Jessie
“Oops…”{PAUSE}“Hey, look at the news…

like the computer told me.”{PAUSE}“Oh no!

Jessie

Jessie
